jobDescription: About the job We are currently seeking an Experienced Machine Learning Engineer to join our great team.  In this role, you will have the opportunity to make a significant impact by developing, implementing, and improving machine learning solutions across our technology and product offerings. In this Role, Your Responsibilities Will Be:  Develop and optimize LLM-powered applications and ML models; Continuously explore, evaluate, and implement cutting-edge techniques and methodologies to enhance product performance and develop new features. Design scalable data pipelines and deploy ML/LLM models in production; Collaborate on product roadmaps and contribute to continuous improvement with AI tools; Handle full project life cycles: problem definition, model deployment, and ongoing enhancements; Identify areas of opportunity and improvement.   Profile:  3+ years in data science or Machine Learning roles; Expertise in ML techniques, LLM methods, and open-source techniques; Curiosity to stay updated with the latest industry trends and technologies; Hands-on experience with popular ML frameworks and libraries; Excellent communication skills and the ability to collaborate with cross-functional teams.   We offer:  Exciting new career in a dynamic, growing organization; Professional and friendly working environment; Health insurance coverage; Meal tickets; Continuous learning by having access to technical training / certifications; Gradually increased number of annual holidays from 21 to 25; Private medical subscription for the family members; Internal referral program.
